data.name: Task-Management-Microservice
data.description: This project is a Task Management System designed to streamline task creation, assignment, and tracking across teams. It allows admins to create and assign tasks to registered users, track progress, and review task submissions. The system is built using a microservices architecture, ensuring scalability and modularity.

data.name: Text-Summarization-Using-LangChain-Gemini
data.description: This project contains the code that help you summarize a text speech uisng the LangChain and the Gemini pro LLM mode
